# Modals of Possibility and Probability

**Rule**  •  Express different degrees of certainty. *Must* ≈ 95 %, *may* ≈ 50 %, *might/could* ≈ 30 %.

**Example (weather forecast – video)**

{{< video src="https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=T1JzGJ5k0pQ" title="Weather Channel forecast" width=640 height=360 >}}

> *“It **might** rain tonight, so keep an umbrella handy.”*
